item.description: Okay, We had alot of fun hanging out with alot of lesbians the other night at Belfrey's. So, we are going again the last day in Jan. Spirits Lounge downstairs is cozy and comfortable for an hr. or so before Karaoke. Hang out and have a drink and socialize...Karaoke starts at 10pm and it is a party!!! Our favorite bar-tender Maria is one of our own! They serve dinner until around 9:30 and appetizers until close. There is dancing also. Come along and join us you won't be disappointed! We close it down at 1am.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the women having the most fun!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Belfry's Karaoke
